meaningMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an う sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>consult</kanji> and the verb vocab version is <vocabulary>to consult with</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to discuss</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: You need <vocabulary>to consult with</vocabulary> a <reading>hacker</reading> (はか) to solve your hacking problem. Imagine consulting with a hacker, whatever a hacker looks like in your mind.
